about_the_game:
NEXT SWEETSTOP

Step into the unsettling world of "Next SweetStop," a psychological horror game that plunges you into the eerie life of a woman working the nightshift at a desolate gas station. But beware, for she is not alone. Haunted by a relentless stalker, her sanity teeters on the edge as she struggles to survive until dawn.

ABOUT THE GAME

Prepare yourself for a truly realistic horror experience as "Next SweetStop" combines the immersive elements of a walking simulator with the chilling ambiance of a gas station and the meticulousness of food preparation. Delve deep into the twisted psyche of the protagonist as you navigate through this atmospheric nightmare..

With an estimated playtime of around 1.5 to 2 hours, "Next SweetStop" delivers a concise yet gripping narrative that keeps you engaged from start to finish. But be warned, the psychological horror elements present in the game may be triggering for some individuals. We strongly advise players with diagnosed psychological disorders to carefully consider their emotional well-being before venturing into the Storyline.

To ensure a seamless experience, saving in "Next SweetStop" is fully automated, allowing you to focus solely on surviving the nightmarish encounters that lie ahead. Can you withstand the psychological torment and escape the clutches of your relentless stalker?

Embark on a terrifying journey into the depths of fear and unravel the mysteries that plague the woman working at the haunted gas station. Discover the truth and face the horrors that await you in "Next SweetStop."


Features

Multiple Endings
Crafting Food and Drinks for Gas Station Customers
Taking care to keep the Gas Station clean
Selling Gasoline
Unlocking Different Areas as the Story Progresses
A Walking Simulator combined with Crafting and Horror Elements
Created with Unreal Engine 5
